calculations.tableau_expression:
// Created by Antoine Des Aulniers Favreau based on Mapping provided by Arun and Chandra Subramanian -- 24 Mai 2017

when "CMFEQSBL" then "REPOS"  //Modified by ADF based on Arun mapping on 7/27/2017  Modified again based on Chelsea mapping on 2/9/2018
when "CMFTOT" then "REPOS" ////Modified by ADF based on Chelsea mapping on 2/09/2018
when "TORCMFBF" then "REPOS"
when "BNSALREPO" then "Singapore"
when "AGY" then "MONEYMKT"


when "COLTRD" then "COLLTRD"

when "COLLTRD Cash" then "COLLTRD"
when "CTRDMTM" then "COLLTRD" //Modified by ADF based on Arun mapping on 7/27/2017

when  "PROVBILL" then "MONEYMKT"

when  "800" then "MONEYMKT"
when  "810" then "MONEYMKT"
when  "811" then "MONEYMKT"
when  "819" then "MONEYMKT"

when  "898" then "MONEYMKT"
when  "905" then "MONEYMKT"

when "CMFLDNEQFF" then "London" //Modified by Shyamala based on Bella's request 3/4/2019
when "CMFSBEEQFF" then "London" //Modified by Shyamala based on Bella's request 3/4/2019


when "NYREPOS" then "New York"
when "NYFUNDING" then "New York"
when "NYFIDERIV" then "New York"
when "NTBIL" then "New York"
when "NYRPOTSY" then "New York"

//when "STRUCTBF" then "STRUCTURED"
when "ECICORPMB" then "New York" 
when "CMFLDNMB" then "London"


else "UNMAPPED"

end
